long_description: The stationary 360 foot massager from Moji features freely rotating, steel massage spheres with different massage zone intensities to mimic the touch of a professional massage therapist. Spheres rotate 360deg to stretch and massage the entire foot as you roll your foot over the spheres. Helps relieve Plantar Fasciitis pain and revitalizes sore, tired and aching feet. Nonslip bottom means the 360 foot massager stays put on the floor.
short_description: The stationary 360 foot massager from Moji features freely rotating, steel massage spheres with different massage zone intensities to mimic the touch of a professional massage therapist.
